BLOCK.QRY: UPDATE ACTGPF_ADV_CONVERT_REQ_TRN set STR_CHECK_STATUS=?,STR_EMP_CODE_OF_HOD=?,DT_APPROVAL_DATE=?,STR_HOD_APPROVAL_STATUS=?,STR_HOD_REMARKS=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? where STR_REQ_APP_NO=? and STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTGPF_ADV_CONVERT_REQ_TRN set STR_EMP_CODE_OF_HOD=?,DT_APPROVAL_DATE=?,STR_HOD_APPROVAL_STATUS=?,STR_HOD_REMARKS=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,GNUM_ISVALID=0 where STR_REQ_APP_NO=? and STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTGPF_ADV_CONVERT_REQ_TRN set STR_CHECK_STATUS=?,STR_REQUEST_VERIFIED=?,STR_SANCTIONED_ORDER_NUMBER=?,DT_DATE_OF_SANCTION=?,STR_ISSUING_AUTHORITY=?,STR_SANCTION_REMARKS=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? where STR_REQ_APP_NO=? and STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTGPF_ADV_CONVERT_REQ_TRN set STR_REQUEST_VERIFIED=?,STR_SANCTIONED_ORDER_NUMBER=?,DT_DATE_OF_SANCTION=?,STR_ISSUING_AUTHORITY=?,STR_SANCTION_REMARKS=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,GNUM_ISVALID=0 where STR_REQ_APP_NO=? and STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE=?
